show_name: Yosuga no Sora: In Solitude, Where We Are Least Alone.
other_title: ヨスガノソラ In solitude, where we are least alone.
opening_theme: "Hiyoku no Hane" (比翼の羽根) by eufonius
ending_theme: #1: "Tsunagu Kizuna (ツナグキズナ)" by Team.Nekokan [Neko] feat. Junca Amaoto (main ending)
#2: "Pinky Jones" by Momoiro Clover Z (ending for specials)
